website_summaries.verdict: A universal knife block with a more modern design and stainless steel finish.
pros: It's easy to slide knives anywhere in this block
Accommodates different blade lengths and the interior flex rods are gentle on knives so they don't dull prematurely
The interior rods can also be cleaned in the dishwasher
Block looks great and is quite durable
cons: This storage option isn't as organized as a traditional knife block and it takes up a lot of space

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get my knives in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 2 and a half years ago and I never have liked it. The part for the bigger knives works just fine, but the lower portion for the steak knives is horrible. It is so tight that I can barely get a knife in. Over and inch and a half. I pull it out to see if I could remove some of the rods, but they do not come out. I cant believe that I didn’t return it when I got it. My sister and my daughter have the same one and theirs are fine, not tight as the one I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Karcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, when trying to decide how to store our knives on the counter, we discovered the Kapoosh products. We like to collect good knives of different brands, so no traditional knife block really worked. We ordered the wood block and it worked well for us. This is our first stainless block, and we love it! This stores a lot of knives. We like that this one has 2 sections, one for large knives, the other for small. It looks great o the counter, especially with all of our stainless appliances.
customer_reviews.author: D. DiNardo

customer_reviews.title: great idea but I'm not keeping
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually use this product because it is too large for my counter space, It is much larger than my 17 piece block and sticks out further than my utensil holder as well. I'm rating 3 stars for looks and timely delivery however the seller requires the customer pay return shipping so it sits here in its box till I figure out what to do with it- it's useless to me. Sad because I really liked the concept and have paid for something I cant use.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Great, on my second one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement buy, as I wore out my first one after 4 years. The tiny plastic strands end up getting bent after much use, and for someone that cooks everyday, the magic number was 4 years. I used this exclusively for my ceramic knives. As the price has come down considerably since it first came out, this is a great buy at $25 for the base model.
customer_reviews.author: Drew W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is a chef and loves this knife holder for his expensive knives (and all the knives) because it is good for the blades. It's one of our staples to give at bridal showers or house warming parties. Everyone should own it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in-law has one of these knife holders and loves it. I wanted one too, but when mine arrived it had permanent water marks on the stainless steel and cracked plastic where the plastic meets the stainless steel. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A. Bullen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality product. Arrived very professionally packaged. Item is sturdy and will not tip over like my last similar type of block, which is excellent and makes for much safer knife storage. Looks great on the counter and has plenty of room for lots of knives, which I needed. I would buy this again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RomaGoods

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous looking and exceptional Kapoosh quality.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and looks. We had our old Rondelle for twelve years - It wore out and we replaced it with this new and improved model. The absolute best knife holder on the planet. Can't say enough great things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Knife Holder
customer_reviews.text: The old wood block does not go with my contemporary kitchen. I love this look and it is easy to use. We had one previously and it lasted for 10 years. something got spilled inside and the bristles were not the same. We just replaced. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: You need quality control!
customer_reviews.text: Outer metal shell had raw edges. It was not fitted into black plastic rim. Since this was a replacement, I threw it away and put inner part into my old frame.
customer_reviews.author: A P BRAUN MD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a knife block that would hold my "odd" assortment of favorite knives. I thought that not having designated slots was the answer. It worked great for the first couple of months then the interior bristles began to break apart and bunch up making it hard to impossible to insert knives. This may be my fault, possibly too many knives but for whatever reason it became a safety issue with the blades being partially exposed. Within six months I replaced it with a conventional knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Saw some reviews that complained about the quality of the product so I was somewhat hesitant to purchase it. But I have had no problems with it and am very satisfied. I hope it provides me with many years of good use.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Knife Block!
customer_reviews.text: This knife block is so much better than wooden ones, and allows for any size knife and any combination of knives. The "brush" which accepts the knives can be washed, and kept like new.
customer_reviews.author: getdave

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have noted, this product is cool looking and works great for about six months. Soon, you will find that your knives can not go all the way into the block as the little spines are damaged by use. Next, the knives will only go halfway in. Dangerous and it looks stupid. I threw mine away as I could not return it past one year. NEVER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: I have had a Kapoish for years and love it. My daughter in law recently said "I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Kapoish for years and love it. My daughter in law recently said "I need one of your bristle things as many of my knives don't fit in a regular block" I know she will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Connalea Howard

customer_reviews.title: Mind the tip and go slow
customer_reviews.text: This saves space and I can fit ten knives in it. However place the knives in slowly or else you may bend the tips and iron the knives. I am not certain that this saves the knives edges, as I still sharpen every use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You'll want this knife storage!
customer_reviews.text: The ease of storing all your knives regardless of size in one safe, easy to access makes this a winner. Bought one for home and another for our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy the wood ones the seems come apart this one is best
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Osanna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, the first lasted 5 years. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: It holds my big knives perfectly and looks good on my kitchen counter. It matches my stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kacprowicz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, I replaced my previous one which was in silver that was a gift & discovered that it came in other colors. Red apple theme is my kitchen colors, so I was thrilled that it comes in red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes any knife collection a set
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife block. I got to put my eclectic knife collection all together to make it look like one whole set. I love that you can take it apart to clean it out too. It was a little larger than I thought it would be, but works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: G.G

customer_reviews.title: Great for knifes
customer_reviews.text: After researching, I’m so glad I purchased this one! It’s perfect for my knifes and sits nicely on my counter. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: this is just amazing. fits all my knives in it and i ...
customer_reviews.text: this is just amazing. fits all my knives in it and i don't have to worry about what slot it HAS to go into. this piece is pretty impressive. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife block. I have an assortment of knifes I like where a standard block wont work. I will buy this for wedding presents.
customer_reviews.author: Grafius

customer_reviews.title: I love how many knives I can fit in this knife ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how many knives I can fit in this knife block! Easy to clean and looks great! Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: llan

customer_reviews.title: well made and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: plenty of knives fit in this knife block. Its super solid so it doesn't move around on the counter. its convenient for holding knives and the smaller knife section is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN O. KRAUSE

customer_reviews.title: great storage for all sizes of knives
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DESIGN. For the first time, we can find all our large and small knives
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: A safer way to store your knives!
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can store all your knives in just one block. No more dangerous knives in drawers!
customer_reviews.author: Mymediagypsy

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful concept! I appreciate having "carte blanche" for inserting ...
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful concept! I appreciate having "carte blanche" for inserting my knives and scissors. Love the fact that I can sanitize the "holding rods" in the dishwasher as necessary. This is the BEST knife block I've ever owned. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Empress Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store knives. Keeps sharp clean and it’s stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Sminxy

customer_reviews.title: Better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a wooden block. So happy I did. Stores more and is easy to clean. Very sleek look
customer_reviews.author: KES1968

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for.our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy to use. Love how it looks. Love storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn s. volpi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Really like how it keeps all of my knives neatly together, even though they're not all matching.
customer_reviews.author: evanicole17

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all knives
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, so very nice to be able to store all of my favorite knifes of various brands and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Dyana Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Takes up a lot of counter space but beyond that we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far. A little tall might be tight squeeze it your cabinets are low.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O

customer_reviews.title: Won’t clean.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning per instructions does not work. Had to buy new again.
customer_reviews.author: David J Greene

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Very stylish looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this forever. Love it. Very stylish looks great. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Champoux

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Bits
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you like little black plastic bits in your food. Every time you put a knife in it cuts the plastic twigs so little black specks get all over. Plastic seasoning, yummy yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Joemama

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first kitchen gadget I've been excited about in years! I absolutely love it. You need to have enough counterspace, but if you don't, look for a smaller version. It's so much fun storing all the knives I use rather try than digging through my drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love MyNew Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: Love the new knife block. Sleek stainless, looks great and works great. I have 8 larger knives in the top section and 8 smaller knives in the lower section with still some room available.
customer_reviews.author: J Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Kapoosh or wooden block?
customer_reviews.text: I collect knives and this block helps store a large amount of knives
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is so neat! Great looking and functional. And, by the way, they sell separate inserts when you. need it
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Groh

customer_reviews.title: Love my knife block
customer_reviews.text: Love this item- matches my new kitchen and is a conversation piece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this item and it is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a really interesting item. I bought it because I had twelve steak knives that did not have a block that fit them. I am happy with this item and it is exactly as described. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it enough for the last 2 to be gifts ...
customer_reviews.text: This was 2nd of 3 that I've ordered. Love it enough for the last 2 to be gifts to my daughter and sister!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for several months now and it is fantastic. It stores about 6 of our knives as ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for several months now and it is fantastic. It stores about 6 of our knives as we do not have a huge knife set. Holds all your standard cutting and bread knives.
customer_reviews.author: Lkosc

customer_reviews.title: Kapoosh is amasing.
customer_reviews.text: I love my kapoosh and would recommend to anyone who wants an easy way to store knives
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I've never had anything like this but I needed something ot hold mine and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never had anything like this but I needed something ot hold mine and my boyfriends knives (two different sets) this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I love the ability to store all sizes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I love the ability to store all sizes of knives easily. It just takes up a LOT of room
customer_reviews.author: C. Magoon

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and all my kids wanted it, so they got one for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has come apart and I am unable to use the bottom portion. I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: benny watson

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for Porterhouse steak knives
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a set of Chef's Catalog stainless steak knives. Large steak knives are hard to fit in some traditional knife blocks, but not with this handsome alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Skibbe

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: simple, elegant and pragmatic. excellent knife holder for all size blades.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new set of steak knives and needed to redo my knife storage. I looked at everything I could find, and took a chance on this. It works great. It fit everything from my knife block, along with the steak knives, and three large specialty knives. If you line everything up, it can fit a lot. I don't put the kitchen scissors or sharpener in there, but that is ok.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Ours arrived slightly damaged. The stainless steel is pulling away from the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: This knofe holder is easy to use and looks terrific. If you like contemporary things...this is perfect to hold your knives!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi W. Demsey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I luv this gadget! It looks super kewl in my kitchen while holding my knives.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my knife set, I bought two more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Product was larger than I expected, but perfect for the kitchen. Absolutely, love this item
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! Don't use any prong type instruments in it or scissors; or put anything that is not a knife like a sharpener. Take care of the kapoosh and the kapoosh will take care of you! I had one for years and really didn't take care of it so i just got a new one and I am really taking care of it because I love it! Live and learn!
customer_reviews.author: Irma Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Holds many more knives than the wooden block. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sissy

customer_reviews.title: Great knife block!
customer_reviews.text: Had another kapoosh which was wood that lasted over 20 years. Wood case split so I had to replace. This is so much better than other knife blocks with slots. You can put whatever type of chef knives, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania shopper

customer_reviews.title: This item is great. Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. Very durable, very sleek looking and knives fit easily and a lot can be added, well worth the Amazon price!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Westcott

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to create my own out of an old can (didn't work so well). When I saw this, I was SO happy knowing I could get my mix of knives out of the dangerous drawer. I put a multitude of shapes and sizes - from my very heavy Chinese Chef's Cleaver to my very tiny paring knife to my kitchen scissors. It seemed expensive for my budget, but if I divide the cost into the years I'll enjoy it (for it's looks and usefulness) it's a deal.
customer_reviews.author: NancyH

customer_reviews.title: Sleek knife block
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold my many knives and color fits in with the kitchen decor.
customer_reviews.author: KoalaBear

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife block. Color is vibrant and product is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Best idea since slided bread
customer_reviews.text: A friend had this knife holder & I was captivated by the concept - There are no "slots" so I can fit my knives, scissors any way I wish in the space available.I got this black model, which looks beautiful on the black stone counters in my kitchen. I have been using it now for a couple months & have ZERO REGRETS. Well made, easy to use, beautiful & saves so much space. I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: D. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It is a great addition to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It is a great addition to the kitchen. I like it better than our old wooden knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Especially like the fact that the bristles ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Especially like the fact that the bristles can be removed and washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. I returned it because it was bigger then expected. if you have a small counter this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Love the KAPOOSH!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, a bit larger than I anticipated, but works great. Looks good on our kitchen counter and easy to clean. Just make sure you read the care instructions included(they are brief, so no excuses), so you will know how to remove the sticks. They can go on the top rack of the dishwasher (no heat drying cycle though).
customer_reviews.author: A.M.G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this stylish way to store and preserve our knives.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce & Lori

customer_reviews.title: Star performer
customer_reviews.text: Having a number of santoku knives, large chef's knives, bread knives, etc. meant we needed several wooden knife blocks on the counter since none had more than 3 of the large slots. The Kapoosh holds everything we had in 2 large blocks -- even my husband loves it. This purchase was a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't need new knives just new holder. Second one I bought - loved the first one but redid our kitchen and needed a white one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PKM

customer_reviews.title: INGENIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ingenious knife block! for the first time i have room to keep all my cutting implements--cooking knives, steak knives, kitchen shears, etc.--in one place. odd-shaped asian-style knives fir perfectly well, so i have everything at my fingertips. i've seen knife holders like this elsewhere, notably at the museum of modern art, but they are smaller. this one is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: book gawker

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases! The new style of this Kapoosh knife block will eliminate the old wooden types. So tickled to have it! I can actually clean this type and fit more knives in this than was ever possible with the previous wooden slot types.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbie

customer_reviews.title: Serves It's Purpose
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with the Kapoosh. I got it as a gift and have put it to use with my new knives as well. I do get the feeling that this may dull knives much faster but time will tell. It also gets more and more tough to get knives in at the beginning but will loosen in time. It has been good so far and plan to continue use. If it does start dulling though, I will be pulling the block that came with the knives out.
customer_reviews.author: TonyJ0502

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic knife holder
customer_reviews.text: Face it, you're going to get a knife set with a block, but you'll end up having to replace some knives and it won't fit. This looks really nice and works perfectly. And yes, yes you can clean the inside very easily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur B.

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: I have looked high and low for the perfect knife block, and I waited about 2 years to get a new one because I knew exactly what I wanted. I couldn't find it though! I did a bunch of searching 6 months later and finally found this one and it is SO PERFECT. It doesn't tip at all and the knives slide in so easy, it's so satisfying to put them away. I seriously have a little happy moment inside my head every time I put them away -- so neat and tidy and accessible! LOVE THIS BLOCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Alberts / The Watering Mouth

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this on my wishlist for about 2 years. When the price dropped to $39.99 I had to order it. We have been married for over 20 years, so our knives are a mish mosh of different brands and sizes. This solves the storage problem perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: shannoni

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I love love love it!!!! Also an added bonus is that when people come over they think its the coolest thing ever too:)
customer_reviews.author: eilujann1981@gmail.com

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This fits our decor and holds a wide variety of knives. I was amazed at how many knives it held, lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is a most wonderful invention. Kapoosh rocks
customer_reviews.text: This is a most wonderful invention. Kapoosh rocks! A very nice accent to my kitchen and oh so easy to store knives without having to make sure I get the right slot for the size of knife because it's uniform and there are no slots. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Kittinger

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous invention!
customer_reviews.text: This product solves all the knife storage problems. It holds all sizes and shapes without having to look for a slot. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna's Luxuries

customer_reviews.title: Definite NO
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart as I took it out of the box. Seems it got broken during the transport. Returned it for credit, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not deep
customer_reviews.text: Useful and served the purpose but some of my knives were too long and didn't fit all the way in. But I still like it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon77

customer_reviews.title: Had 2 years and still looks great
customer_reviews.text: We have had this thing 2 years. We love it. It's pretty easy to clean since you can take the center out and rinse it off.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Knife holder
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law wanted this for Christmas. I am sure she wll love it since she requested this.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann

customer_reviews.title: Not your mama's knife holder
customer_reviews.text: The Kapoosh is more than a knife holder it's a piece of art. It's convenient to use and it's beautiful. I bought one for my husband (me) and my two sons for father's day they were pleased. My son who works as a special ed teacher in a special ed school told me about it because it was being used at the school and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love My Kapoosh!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my Daughter for Xmas because she was trying to take mine which I have had for years! I love my Kapoosh and she loves her too. So much more convenient than other knife hers.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Was a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mother for Christmas. She is very particular with things like this and she just thinks this is the greatest thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Horror movie holic

customer_reviews.title: Kapoosh for a catering kitchen
customer_reviews.text: A Kapoosh was purchased to be used in the kitchen of the Ladies' Library in Kalamazoo, MI. Our cooks were having difficulty finding the knife they wanted in the over crowded drawer. Now with the Kapoosh they can see the correct knife to use. And this also allowed drawer space for other cooking utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Baker

customer_reviews.title: Kapoosh Knife and Utensil Holder
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this holder for my carving knives. It gets them out of the way and also protects the blades. I would prefer it to have beeen a little deeper in order to accommodate my 10-inch chef's knife. It holds several knives and is easy to place next to my cutting board, making it very handy.
customer_reviews.author: bscheff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Stores every size of knife, keeps my mismatched knives stored together attractively.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jacildone

customer_reviews.title: Function and Design
customer_reviews.text: This clever knife holder is not only functional, it's a great design element in a contemporary kitchen. The knives are held in place in the sleek holder by a flexible material that allows the user to randomly insert and remove knives without the inconvenience of locating prescribed slots for each knife size and type. It's a great tool with personality!
customer_reviews.author: J. Converse

customer_reviews.title: attractive and practical! Such a smart design.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can easily put all my knives and scissors in one place! fab fab fab
customer_reviews.author: TheWizardofOz

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It allows me to store my current knifes handy and safely. What i like the most, is that it allows me to store my current knifes (long, short) and other cutting instruments in the kitchen safely.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Clever!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a clever product. I love it! I've given it as a gift twice and it has been well received.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: Kapoosh Rondelle Knife Block, Stainless Steel
feature_bullets: Universal storage, allows you to insert knives anywhere
Features 2 tiers to fit knives with blades up to 5 and 8 inches long
Food-grade plastic flex rods won't chip or dull your knife blades
Patented flex rod technology conforms to shape of each knife and holds it in place
Flex rods are removable and top-rack dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
